context: eBay focuses on enthusiast categories including collectibles, trading cards, luxury goods, and refurbished electronics. The company divested StubHub and PayPal to focus on core marketplace.

competitors.name: Etsy
competitors.notes: Marketplace for unique and vintage goods

competitors.name: Facebook Marketplace
competitors.notes: Local selling integrated with social network

competitors.name: StockX
competitors.notes: Sneaker and streetwear marketplace with authentication
